subject: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Friend,
I and my committee members have a need for an individual Who is
willing to partner with us and pay your Overdue contract payment
Valued the total sum of $20 Million procured overseas. you can now
contact the United Nation USA with the information below and they are
the people who are in charge of your payment now. for your earlier
Information, Make Sure that all your Documents as the Beneficiary is
ready, you can mow contact the United Nation with their contact,and
Once you contacted them you shall respond to us immediately.
Mr.Robert Smith.
United Nation USA.
Email:robert_s26@aol.com
Best Regards,
Dr John Joe
My Whats app Line
+233 2760 90480

subject: Re:   Dear Friend,
body:
Hello Dr. John Joe,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this interesting opportunity. I'm intrigued by the prospect of partnering with your committee and assisting in the payment process.

Could you please provide more details about this contract? What would be my role and responsibilities in this partnership? Also, could you clarify what documents are required?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Zachary
